CustomField.formula: IF(Server__c, "Server;", "")+ IF(NCR_Terminals__c, "NCR Terminals;","") + IF(Non_NCR_Terminals__c, "NON NCR Terminals;","") + IF(iPads_Tablets__c , "Ipads;","")+ IF(Printers__c, "Printers;","") + IF(Firewall__c, "Firewall;","") + IF(Cash_Drawers__c, "Cash Drawers;","") + IF(Monitor__c,"Monitor;","")+IF(BOH_Printer__c,"BOH Printer;","")+IF(Keyboard_Mouse__c,"Keyboard/Mouse;","")+IF(Hardware_Tested__c,"Hardware Tested;","")+IF(ISnull(Image_Creation_Hours_Sold__c ),TEXT(Image_Creation_Hours_Sold__c) ,'')
CustomField.label: CustomerProvidedHWSelection
